login.session-expired: Your session has expired. Please log-in again.

register.email-not-shared: Your email address will not be shared with anyone else.
register.email-taken: This email address is already registered.

password-policy.title: Password Policy
password-policy.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase character.
password-policy.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase character.
password-policy.number: Password must contain at least one number.
password-policy.special-char: Password must contain at least one special character.
password-policy.length: Password must be between 8 and 36 characters (inclusive).

custom-preset.title: Preset Details
custom-preset.generic-error: An error occurred while saving your preset.

mode.title: Select Mode
mode.play-desc: Test your knowledge on a given topic. Choose from a preset game mode or customise your own settings.
mode.learn-desc: Study a topic of your choice via flash cards and spaced repetition learning.

type.title: Select Type
type.preset-desc: Choose from one of the preset game configurations for your chosen topic.
type.custom-desc: Configure any of the available settings to create a customised game mode.

question.title: Question Settings
question.desc: Configure settings regarding the types of question you'll be asked.
question.fields-desc: Select which piece of information you are given in the question and what you must give as the answer. You cannot select the same field for both.
question.score-desc: You gain a base score per question answered correctly. Streaking will increase your multiplier exponentially, but breaking it will reset to the base. Skipping a question will lose you the 1 x the base score.

cards-quantity.desc: You'll be shown {{quantity}} answers to choose from.

text.name: Text
text.desc: You're given a single piece of info (symbol, reading, meaning etc.) per question and must enter the request other piece of information.

choice.name: Multiple Choice
choice.desc: You're given something for the given data and are presented with multiple answer options of which one is correct.

match.name: Match
match.desc: You're given several pieces of info with their answers and you must match them up correctly.

audio.name: Audio
audio.desc: You're played an audio clip and must type or select the meaning of it.

random.name: Random
random.desc: You'll be given all question types shuffled randomly.

hint.title: Hint Settings
hint.enable-desc: Hints allow you to reveal a small piece of information about the current question if you're struggling.
hint.quantity-desc: Select the number of hints you want for the entire game. You only get to use one per question.
hint.infinite-desc: Remove the quantity cap and use as many hints as you'd like.

life.title: Life Settings
life.desc: Configure the number of lives you start with. For an added challenge you can give yourself only a few, or unlimited if you're playing more casually.
life.lives-desc: Select the number of lives you want to start the game with. You can choose between 1 and 10. Disabling will give you infinite.

time.title: Time Settings
time.desc: Configure the style of timer you want for the game or disable it entirely.
time.timed-desc: You'll simply be timed starting from 00:00 and the timer will stop when you finish the game or lose. Useful for speed-running certain topics to test your mastery.
time.countdown-desc: You'll have a set number of seconds to answer each question. Failing to answer correctly in the given time will lose you a life. Answering correctly will reset the timer.
time.seconds-quantity: Select the number of seconds per question below

kana.hiragana-desc: Hiragana is the main syllabary that defines all the sounds that make up the spoken Japanese language. It is also used in the written language for Japanese words and furigana. These characters are quite cursive in nature.
kana.katakana-desc: Katakana is a mirror of the aforementioned Hiragana syllabary. There is a 1 to 1 mapping of each kana that is pronounced in the same way. They are written differently and are generally only used for loan words and onomatopoeia. These characters are much more angular and linear than Hiragana.
kana.diagraphs-desc: Diagraphs are combinations of two kana. Both syllabaries have the same diagraphs in their respective kana.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.login-message: You must be logged in to save.

profile.description: Create an account to save custom presets, compete in the high-scores, and track your progress.

quit-confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to quit?
quit-confirmation.body: You have unsaved changes to your favourites.

event.streak: You a reached a {{streak}} day streak!

general.heading: General Settings
general.desc: General settings for common elements and actions around the app.

activity-feed.heading: Activity Feed
activity-feed.desc: Set the number of events to display in the activity feed card by default.

learn.heading: Learn Settings
learn.desc: Configure settings related to learning Japanese.

flash-cards.heading: Flash Cards Per Day
flash-cards.desc: Set the number of new flash cards you wish to see per day. New cards will only be issued if your deck is active and you have no outstanding cards to be reviewed.

romaji.heading: Rōmaji Settings
romaji.desc: Set the default behaviour for showing rōmaji variants of kana. Rōmaji or ローマ字 (rōmaji) is the romanisation of the Japanese written language.

play.heading: Play Settings
play.desc: Configure settings related to games and other play-orientated modes.

high-scores.label: High-Score Preference
high-scores.desc: Set the default behaviour for submitting your play sessions to the high-scores.

interface.heading: Interface Settings
interface.desc: Configure the user interface to customise the layout and look-and-feel to your liking.

customise-dashboard-layout.heading: Customise Dashboard Layout
customise-dashboard-layout.desc: Edit the home page dashboard layout. Cards can be toggled on or off, resized or moved to different columns.

theme.heading: Theme
theme.desc: Switch between the dark and light variations of the user-interface theming.

kanji-font.heading: Kanji Font
kanji-font.desc: Set your preferred default font-face used for all kanji characters in the app.

language.heading: Language & Internationalisation
language.desc: Set the language that all major buttons, menus and links use.

confidence-menu-style.heading: Confidence Menu Style
confidence-menu-style.desc: Change the format of the confidence rating widget used during flash card learning sessions.

notification.heading: Notification Settings
notification.desc: Configure settings related to your notification centre and app-wide communication.

streak-notifications.heading: Streak Notifications
streak-notifications.desc: Toggle notifications for significant streak milestones.

outstanding-mistakes-reminder.heading: Outstanding Mistakes Reminder
outstanding-mistakes-reminder.desc: Toggle reminders for outstanding mistakes that need reviewing.

user.heading: User Settings
user.desc: Configure settings related to your user profile.

profile-visibility.heading: Profile Visibility
profile-visibility.desc: Change the visibility of your profile to other users. By default your username will be visible to others on the high-scores (should you submit them). You can keep your info private or show it to friends only.

streak-card-preference.heading: Streak Card Preference
streak-card-preference.desc: Choose which statistic is displayed on the dashboards streak card. Defaults to the date you created your account. You can change it to your current streak or choose a custom date.

danger-zone.heading: Danger Zone
danger-zone.desc: Destructive settings that you might want to think twice about!

clear-local-storage.heading: Clear Local Storage
clear-local-storage.desc: Deletes all locally stored data from your browser except for your user session. Does not permanently delete any saved data, but may increase loading times temporarily.

reset-high-scores.heading: Reset High-Scores
reset-high-scores.desc: Resets all your saved scores across the app. Any ranks you currently hold on the high-scores will be lost.

reset-statistics.heading: Reset Statistics
reset-statistics.desc: Resets all your tracked statistics such as games played or won. This does not include flash card data.

reset-flash-cards.heading: Reset Flash Cards
reset-flash-cards.desc: Resets all your flash card data. Does not affect stats.

delete-account.heading: Delete Account
delete-account.desc: Delete your user account and all of your personal data. This is an irreversible operation. You'll need to provide your password for confirmation.

popover.title: Delete Account
popover.text: Delete your user account and all of your personal data. This is an irreversible operation. You'll need to provide your password for confirmation.

meaning.name: English Meaning
meaning.desc: The meaning of the word or character in English. Usually a single word.

kanji.name: Kanji
kanji.desc: Some words can be expressed as a single Kanji.

kana.name: Kana
kana.desc: The Japanese syllabaries are kana. All words can expressed in Hiragana or Katakana.

japanese.name: Japanese
japanese.desc: Some words can be expressed in all kanji or a mixture of kanji and kana.

romaji.name: Rōmaji
romaji.desc: The romanisation of Japanese kana. I.e. 'a', 'ke' or 'zu'.

on.name: On'Yomi Reading
on.desc: The original Chinese readings of a kanji character in Hiragana.

kun.name: Kun'Yomi Reading
kun.desc: The Japanese readings of a kanji character in Katakana.

random.name: Random
random.desc: A random selection of any of the available data fields.

memory-game.quit-title: Are you sure you want to quit?
memory-game.quit-body: You'll lose your current progress, but you'll see the results of your game thus far.

results-screen.not-submitted: Your score was not submitted to the high-scores. You can change your preferences here.
